original_text:
Indian Ruby
Il tema di questa slot machine prodotta dalla software house tedesca Merkur Gaming è quello di un viaggio alla scoperta dell’India. A essere sinceri, c’è da fare un plauso per l’originalità, infatti, non è una tematica molto sfruttata nei giochi di slot, che privilegiano invece da una parte le culture classiche, quali quella egizia o romana, e dall’altra il fascino dell’Oriente (non si contano più, ad esempio, le slot machine a tema cinese).
Indian Ruby è un viaggio alla scoperta dei colori e dei sapori dell’India, che ha come punto di partenza il focus su uno degli animali che più rappresentano il continente indiano, ossia il maestoso elefante.
La schermata inziale si apre infatti con l’immagine di una sorta di corsa di elefanti su una strada polverosa e i pachidermi trovano il loro spazio anche sui rulli della slot.
La griglia di gioco invece è posizionata in una sorta di antico tempio, che richiama il rosso dei rubini presenti nel titolo.
Complessivamente possiamo dire che il compartimento grafico è ben realizzato, con immagini molto nitide e accattivanti e che, seppur mancando particolari effetti speciali o animazioni tridimensionali, visivamente Indian Ruby è più che soddisfacente!
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
Indian Ruby ha una struttura di gioco molto tradizionale con tre rulli e cinque righe, mentre le linee di pagamento sono dieci. Su ogni linea è possibile effettuare delle puntate a partire da solo un centesimo fino a un massimo di 1 €, il che da una parte farà storcere il naso agli high rollers mentre dall’altra renderà contenti i giocatori occasionali o coloro che non amano effettuare puntate elevate.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore (return to player o RTP) di Indian Ruby si attesta su un canonico 96,19%, in linea con la maggior parte dei giochi di slot ma niente di particolarmente ghiotto, se comparato con altre slot machine della Merkur Gaming che superano abbondantemente il 97%.
Indian Ruby è un gioco caratterizzato da una bassa volatilità, come si può prevedere anche osservando il range di scommesse, ciò significa che sebbene ci si possano aspettare delle vincite costanti, sarà veramente difficile che queste possano essere altamente remunerative.
Simboli e funzionalità di Indian Ruby
Il gameplay di Indian Ruby è decisamente semplice e intuitivo, e lo si capisce anche osservando i simboli: sono presenti solo due simboli speciali (i tradizionali Wild e Scatter) e nessun Bonus. Le funzionalità oltre il gioco base si limitano ai giri gratuiti e alla possibilità di ottenere alcuni moltiplicatori.
I simboli con più  basso valore sono rappresentati dai numeri e dalle lettere che si riferiscono alle carte da gioco dal 10 all’Asso, che pagano da 10 a 100 volte il valore della puntata se compaiono su tutti i cinque rulli, mentre quelli con più alto valore sono i simboli legati all’India e includono una pentola, un sacco di spezie e una collana, con pagamenti fino a 500 volte la scommessa.
Il rubino rosso che dà il titolo alla slot è il simbolo Wild che ha funzione di jolly e regala un moltiplicatore x2 quando contribuisce a realizzare una combinazione vincente. Lo Scatter infine è rappresentato da un maestoso elefante, che oltre a regalare dei giri gratuiti attiva la funzione Respins e permette di ottenere un moltiplicatore di 1000x, ossia la vincita massima a cui si può ambire giocando con questa slot.

raw_translation.response:
Indian Ruby 
Explore the vibrant culture of India with this slot game created by German software company Merkur Gaming. Finally, a game that does not rely on the overused themes of ancient Egypt or Rome, or the all-too-common Chinese motifs. Indian Ruby takes you through a colorful journey of the exotic flavors of India, starting with the majestic elephant - an animal that represents the continent. The game opens with a thrilling chase scene of elephants on a dusty road, and these magnificent creatures continue to be featured on the reels throughout the game. The game's grid is set in an ancient temple, highlighted with the hues of rubies - hence, the name Indian Ruby. 

The graphics are expertly crafted, with sharp and enticing visuals. While there is a lack of special effects or 3D animations, visually, Indian Ruby is more than satisfying. 

Features of the slot machine 
Indian Ruby maintains a traditional game structure, with three reels and five rows. There are ten paylines, and bets can be made starting at only one penny up to a maximum of one euro. This may disappoint the high rollers, but it satisfies casual players or those who don't want to make high bets. 

The theoretical return to player (RTP) of Indian Ruby is at 96.19%, which is consistent with most slot games but isn't particularly impressive when compared to other Merkur Gaming slots that exceed 97%. Indian Ruby is a low volatility game that has consistent winning potential. However, the chances of getting highly rewarding wins are slim. 

Symbols and features of Indian Ruby 
Indian Ruby's gameplay is simple and easy to understand, reflected in the symbols used in the game. There are only two special symbols - the traditional Wild and Scatter symbols and no bonus rounds. The extra features offered are free spins and the possibility of earning multipliers. 

The low-value symbols are digit and letter cards from 10 to Ace, paying out from 10 to 100 times the bet value when they appear on all five reels. The high-value symbols are India-themed, including a pot, a bag of spices, and a necklace, offering payouts of up to 500 times the bet. The red ruby, the game's title symbol, serves as the Wild symbol, doubling the win when it contributes to a winning combination. Lastly, the Scatter symbol is a majestic elephant that triggers free spins and Respins feature, allowing you to earn a multiplier of up to 1000x your bet - the highest payout you can score in the game. 

In conclusion, Indian Ruby may not indulge the high rollers, but it provides an immersive experience of the ancient Indian culture, bright and lively graphics, and decent chances of winning.

raw_translation.response:
Indian Ruby
This slot machine, produced by the German software house Merkur Gaming, takes you on a journey to discover India. To be honest, we must applaud the originality of this game, as it is not a theme that is often explored in slot games. Usually, classic cultures, such as Egyptian or Roman, or the charm of the East, especially China, dominate the slot industry. Indian Ruby, on the other hand, is a journey to discover the colors and flavors of India, with its starting point being the focus on one of the most majestic animals representing the Indian continent -- the elephant.

The initial screen opens with a picture of a sort of elephant race on a dusty road, with these pachyderms also finding their space on the reels of the slot. The game grid, on the other hand, is positioned in an ancient temple that recalls the red of rubies, which are the focus of the title. Generally speaking, the graphics are well-made, with very sharp and catchy images. Although it lacks special effects or 3D animations, visually Indian Ruby is more than satisfactory for experienced gamblers!

Main characteristics of the slot machine
Indian Ruby has a very traditional game structure with three reels and five rows, while the paylines are ten. On each line, you can bet starting from only one cent up to a maximum of €1, which may irk high rollers but please casual players or those who do not like to make high bets. The theoretical return to player (RTP) of Indian Ruby stands at a canonical 96.19%, in line with most slot games. However, it is not particularly mouth-watering compared to other Merkur Gaming slot machines that exceed 97%.

Indian Ruby is a game characterized by low volatility, which can be predicted by observing the range of bets. This means that although you can expect constant wins, it will be challenging to achieve highly lucrative ones.

Symbols and features of Indian Ruby
The gameplay of Indian Ruby is relatively simple and intuitive, as can be seen through the symbols it uses. There are only two special symbols (the traditional Wild and Scatter) and no Bonus. The functions beyond the base game are limited to free spins and the possibility of obtaining some multipliers.

The symbols with the lowest value are represented by numbers and letters that refer to playing cards from 10 to Ace, which pay from 10 to 100 times the value of the bet if they appear on all five reels. The symbols with the higher value are those related to India and include a pot, a bag of spices, and a necklace, with payoffs of up to 500 times the bet.

The red ruby that gives its name to the slot is the Wild symbol that acts as a joker and gives a 2x multiplier when contributing to making a winning combination. Finally, the Scatter is represented by a majestic elephant that not only gives free spins but also activates the Respins function, allowing you to obtain a 1000x multiplier, which is the maximum win you can get while playing this slot.

message.content:
Indian Ruby
This slot machine, produced by the German software house Merkur Gaming, takes you on a journey to discover India. To be honest, we must applaud the originality of this game, as it is not a theme that is often explored in slot games. Usually, classic cultures, such as Egyptian or Roman, or the charm of the East, especially China, dominate the slot industry. Indian Ruby, on the other hand, is a journey to discover the colors and flavors of India, with its starting point being the focus on one of the most majestic animals representing the Indian continent -- the elephant.

The initial screen opens with a picture of a sort of elephant race on a dusty road, with these pachyderms also finding their space on the reels of the slot. The game grid, on the other hand, is positioned in an ancient temple that recalls the red of rubies, which are the focus of the title. Generally speaking, the graphics are well-made, with very sharp and catchy images. Although it lacks special effects or 3D animations, visually Indian Ruby is more than satisfactory for experienced gamblers!

Main characteristics of the slot machine
Indian Ruby has a very traditional game structure with three reels and five rows, while the paylines are ten. On each line, you can bet starting from only one cent up to a maximum of €1, which may irk high rollers but please casual players or those who do not like to make high bets. The theoretical return to player (RTP) of Indian Ruby stands at a canonical 96.19%, in line with most slot games. However, it is not particularly mouth-watering compared to other Merkur Gaming slot machines that exceed 97%.

Indian Ruby is a game characterized by low volatility, which can be predicted by observing the range of bets. This means that although you can expect constant wins, it will be challenging to achieve highly lucrative ones.

Symbols and features of Indian Ruby
The gameplay of Indian Ruby is relatively simple and intuitive, as can be seen through the symbols it uses. There are only two special symbols (the traditional Wild and Scatter) and no Bonus. The functions beyond the base game are limited to free spins and the possibility of obtaining some multipliers.

The symbols with the lowest value are represented by numbers and letters that refer to playing cards from 10 to Ace, which pay from 10 to 100 times the value of the bet if they appear on all five reels. The symbols with the higher value are those related to India and include a pot, a bag of spices, and a necklace, with payoffs of up to 500 times the bet.

The red ruby that gives its name to the slot is the Wild symbol that acts as a joker and gives a 2x multiplier when contributing to making a winning combination. Finally, the Scatter is represented by a majestic elephant that not only gives free spins but also activates the Respins function, allowing you to obtain a 1000x multiplier, which is the maximum win you can get while playing this slot.

response.headline: Game Structure
response.content: Indian Ruby has a traditional structure with three reels, five rows, and ten paylines. You can bet starting from one cent up to €1 per line. The game has a low volatility rating with a return-to-player (RTP) percentage of 96.19%, which is average for slot games.

response.headline: Special Symbols
response.content: The game has two special symbols, the Wild and the Scatter. The red ruby represents the Wild; it acts as a joker and has a 2x multiplier when contributing to a winning combination. The Scatter is represented by a majestic elephant that can trigger free spins and activate the Respins function.

response.headline: Symbol Payoffs
response.content: Indian Ruby's low-value symbols include numbers and letters that pay from 10 to 100 times the value of the bet. The higher-value symbols are related to India's traditions and include a pot, a bag of spices, and a necklace, giving payouts of up to 500 times the bet.

response.headline: Respins Function
response.content: The Respins feature is triggered by the Scatter symbol, allowing players to get a 1000x multiplier, the game's maximum win. This function is designed to help players score big wins.

response.headline: Maximum Win
response.content: The maximum win in Indian Ruby is obtained by using the Respins function. Players can earn a 1000x multiplier, meaning that if they bet the maximum amount, they can win up to €10,000. However, as a low volatility game, highly lucrative wins are difficult to achieve.

This slot machine, produced by the German software house Merkur Gaming, takes you on a journey to discover India. To be honest, we must applaud the originality of this game, as it is not a theme that is often explored in slot games. Usually, classic cultures, such as Egyptian or Roman, or the charm of the East, especially China, dominate the slot industry. Indian Ruby, on the other hand, is a journey to discover the colors and flavors of India, with its starting point being the focus on one of the most majestic animals representing the Indian continent -- the elephant.

The initial screen opens with a picture of a sort of elephant race on a dusty road, with these pachyderms also finding their space on the reels of the slot. The game grid, on the other hand, is positioned in an ancient temple that recalls the red of rubies, which are the focus of the title. Generally speaking, the graphics are well-made, with very sharp and catchy images. Although it lacks special effects or 3D animations, visually Indian Ruby is more than satisfactory for experienced gamblers!

Main characteristics of the slot machine
Indian Ruby has a very traditional game structure with three reels and five rows, while the paylines are ten. On each line, you can bet starting from only one cent up to a maximum of €1, which may irk high rollers but please casual players or those who do not like to make high bets. The theoretical return to player (RTP) of Indian Ruby stands at a canonical 96.19%, in line with most slot games. However, it is not particularly mouth-watering compared to other Merkur Gaming slot machines that exceed 97%.

Indian Ruby is a game characterized by low volatility, which can be predicted by observing the range of bets. This means that although you can expect constant wins, it will be challenging to achieve highly lucrative ones.

Symbols and features of Indian Ruby
The gameplay of Indian Ruby is relatively simple and intuitive, as can be seen through the symbols it uses. There are only two special symbols (the traditional Wild and Scatter) and no Bonus. The functions beyond the base game are limited to free spins and the possibility of obtaining some multipliers.

The symbols with the lowest value are represented by numbers and letters that refer to playing cards from 10 to Ace, which pay from 10 to 100 times the value of the bet if they appear on all five reels. The symbols with the higher value are those related to India and include a pot, a bag of spices, and a necklace, with payoffs of up to 500 times the bet.

The red ruby that gives its name to the slot is the Wild symbol that acts as a joker and gives a 2x multiplier when contributing to making a winning combination. Finally, the Scatter is represented by a majestic elephant that not only gives free spins but also activates the Respins function, allowing you to obtain a 1000x multiplier, which is the maximum win you can get while playing this slot.

Review:
 
Game Structure

Indian Ruby has a traditional structure with three reels, five rows, and ten paylines. You can bet starting from one cent up to €1 per line. The game has a low volatility rating with a return-to-player (RTP) percentage of 96.19%, which is average for slot games.

Special Symbols

The game has two special symbols, the Wild and the Scatter. The red ruby represents the Wild; it acts as a joker and has a 2x multiplier when contributing to a winning combination. The Scatter is represented by a majestic elephant that can trigger free spins and activate the Respins function.

Symbol Payoffs

Indian Ruby's low-value symbols include numbers and letters that pay from 10 to 100 times the value of the bet. The higher-value symbols are related to India's traditions and include a pot, a bag of spices, and a necklace, giving payouts of up to 500 times the bet.

Respins Function

The Respins feature is triggered by the Scatter symbol, allowing players to get a 1000x multiplier, the game's maximum win. This function is designed to help players score big wins.

Maximum Win

The maximum win in Indian Ruby is obtained by using the Respins function. Players can earn a 1000x multiplier, meaning that if they bet the maximum amount, they can win up to €10,000. However, as a low volatility game, highly lucrative wins are difficult to achieve.

faq.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Indian Ruby".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Indian Ruby
This slot machine, produced by the German software house Merkur Gaming, takes you on a journey to discover India. To be honest, we must applaud the originality of this game, as it is not a theme that is often explored in slot games. Usually, classic cultures, such as Egyptian or Roman, or the charm of the East, especially China, dominate the slot industry. Indian Ruby, on the other hand, is a journey to discover the colors and flavors of India, with its starting point being the focus on one of the most majestic animals representing the Indian continent -- the elephant.

The initial screen opens with a picture of a sort of elephant race on a dusty road, with these pachyderms also finding their space on the reels of the slot. The game grid, on the other hand, is positioned in an ancient temple that recalls the red of rubies, which are the focus of the title. Generally speaking, the graphics are well-made, with very sharp and catchy images. Although it lacks special effects or 3D animations, visually Indian Ruby is more than satisfactory for experienced gamblers!

Main characteristics of the slot machine
Indian Ruby has a very traditional game structure with three reels and five rows, while the paylines are ten. On each line, you can bet starting from only one cent up to a maximum of €1, which may irk high rollers but please casual players or those who do not like to make high bets. The theoretical return to player (RTP) of Indian Ruby stands at a canonical 96.19%, in line with most slot games. However, it is not particularly mouth-watering compared to other Merkur Gaming slot machines that exceed 97%.

Indian Ruby is a game characterized by low volatility, which can be predicted by observing the range of bets. This means that although you can expect constant wins, it will be challenging to achieve highly lucrative ones.

Symbols and features of Indian Ruby
The gameplay of Indian Ruby is relatively simple and intuitive, as can be seen through the symbols it uses. There are only two special symbols (the traditional Wild and Scatter) and no Bonus. The functions beyond the base game are limited to free spins and the possibility of obtaining some multipliers.

The symbols with the lowest value are represented by numbers and letters that refer to playing cards from 10 to Ace, which pay from 10 to 100 times the value of the bet if they appear on all five reels. The symbols with the higher value are those related to India and include a pot, a bag of spices, and a necklace, with payoffs of up to 500 times the bet.

The red ruby that gives its name to the slot is the Wild symbol that acts as a joker and gives a 2x multiplier when contributing to making a winning combination. Finally, the Scatter is represented by a majestic elephant that not only gives free spins but also activates the Respins function, allowing you to obtain a 1000x multiplier, which is the maximum win you can get while playing this slot.

faq.question: What is Indian Ruby slot game?
faq.answer: Indian Ruby is a slot machine from Merkur Gaming with an Indian theme that features an elephant race and a temple backdrop. It has three reels and five rows with ten paylines. Symbols include playing cards, pots, spices, necklaces, and rubies. The Wild symbol is the ruby and the elephant is the Scatter.

faq.answer: Indian Ruby is a game characterized by low volatility, which means that while you can expect constant wins, it will be challenging to achieve highly lucrative ones.

faq.answer: The special symbols in Indian Ruby are the Wild symbol (ruby) that acts as a joker with a 2x multiplier and the Scatter symbol (elephant) that gives free spins and activates the Respins function, allowing you to obtain a 1000x multiplier, which is the maximum win you can get while playing this slot.

faq.answer: No, there are no Bonus features in Indian Ruby, but players can still enjoy free spins and the possibility of obtaining some multipliers.

faq.answer: Although it lacks special effects or 3D animations, the graphics of Indian Ruby are well-made, with very sharp and catchy images. Visually Indian Ruby is more than satisfactory for experienced gamblers.

dalle-prompt.response:
Prompt: 

Create a fun and colorful cartoon-style image for Indian Ruby, featuring a happy Maya warrior with glasses.

The Maya warrior should be in bright and vibrant colors, with a big smile on their face and wearing a headband with the Indian Ruby slot game logo on it. They should be holding a handful of ruby gemstones in one hand and a slot machine lever in the other. In the background, there should be a colorful Indian temple and a few elephants scattered around.

The overall vibe of the image should be lively and exciting, capturing the fun and unique theme of Indian Ruby while showcasing the potential for big wins with the ruby Wild symbol and Scatter elephant.
